DOC.brief_summary: Two type Presurgical Nasoalveolar Molding ( NAM ) coexist Craniofacial Center Chang Gung Memorial Hospital . The objective study compare number clinical visit , total price , complication nasal symmetry two NAM reconstruction method .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Nasoalveolar Molding Techniques Complete Unilateral Cleft Lip Patient
DOC.detailed_description: Grayson 's NAM reconstruction start alveolar mold first . The alveolar molding make gradual modification acrylic plate periodic acrylic add grind . After alveolar cleave gap le 5 mm ( usually end second month ) , nasal molding add alveolar molding plate . Figueroa 's NAM reconstruction use labial tape acrylic relief palatal plate approximate alveolar gap . The device start nasal alveolar mold simultaneously .
